review: What I like most about the Fire TV Stick is that it was easy to set up.
author: BARNEY LOCHTE

review: We love it.  No streaming problems at all and easy to install & get started.
author: Paul Mechling

review: Our smart tv somehow became very temperamental. I bought this on a whim and it's great! We stream Amazon & Netflix movies with no problem!
author: SK Carpenter

review: I have only had this device for a very short time and haven't used it much.  It is easy to install and relatively easy to use at the start.  Some of the things like Amazon, and Netflix require some setting up but all in all this is a good device.
author: Bob marsh

review: I already had Amazon Prime and added Sling TV for all the options I need except for ABC, NBC, CBS and Fox. Still investigating those.
author: Stephen R "Steve"

review: Love this, use it all the time
author: Pat

review: if there is nothing I care to watch, this is great.
author: Sue Simpson
